title: What ever happened to the cooler full of money that was found in the Wal-Mart parking lot many years ago?  Did the person that found it get to keep any of the money?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3352 We're sorry it took so long but when dealing with the DEA, there's a lot of calling and re-calling until we get an answer.
